CHANGES: ## 2026.01.25.66 - Official Initial Release. - Modern, high-contrast Dashboard card with real-time RAM Saved chart. - Dynamic ZRAM swap management UI (Create/Remove) with boot persistence. - Support for all kernel-supported compression algorithms (zstd, lz4, etc.). - Built-in Safe Evacuation guards to prevent system crashes during ZRAM removal. - Robust Hybrid Installer supporting both Online and Air-Gapped/Manual deployments. - High-contrast UI optimized for Unraid 7.2+.
